page.description: Fires before each row in the list is drawn.

argument.name: index
argument.description: A zero based row index for the current row.

discussion.p: The *[js:onBeforeItemDraw]* event is triggered before each item in the list is drawn. This event can be used to change the displayed row data (stored in the *[js:data]* argument) without changing the data stored in the List control.

JavaScript in this event can reference the *[js:data]* and *[js:index]* arguments to get more information about the current row being drawn. In addition, the JavaScript can reference the 'this' scope.
